str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pro and ballo; to throw forward, i.e. Push to the front, germinate.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Summer. From a primary thero; properly, heat, i.e. Summer.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Near. From a primary verb agcho; near.
